amendment.description: An amendment numbered 69 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to ensure none of the funds made available go towards implementing the recommendations in the 2023 Interim Report issued by the USDA Equity Commission.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
